quote: As I went back alone over that familiar road, I could almost believe that a boy and girl ran along beside me, as our shadows used to do, laughing and whispering to each other in the grass.
quote_letters: AS I WENT BACK ALONE OVER THAT FAMILIAR ROAD I COULD ALMOST BELIEVE THAT A BOY AND GIRL RAN ALONG BESIDE ME AS OUR SHADOWS USED TO DO LAUGHING AND WHISPERING TO EACH OTHER IN THE GRASS
